FuncDef: The als restart command manually restarts the laser of an interface. The als restart command manually restarts the laser of an interface.
ParentView: 100GE interface view,10GE interface view,200GE interface view,25GE interface view,400GE interface view,50GE interface view,Interface group view
ExtraInfo:
When the laser of an optical module works in manual restart mode, if the faulty fiber link is recovered, you need to manually open the laser so that the laser sends one pulse to clear LOS of the optical interface. Then the data communication is recovered.
The constraints on ALS are as follows:
